errors.error_description: Added unnecessary system dependencies (VASP, LAMMPS, Quantum ESPRESSO) and pinned old versions of numpy and scipy that may not be required or compatible
correction_candidates: Remove the system dependencies and version pinning, use: pip install quacc
Install only the core package: pip install quacc --no-deps
Use conda instead: conda install -c conda-forge quacc
Install with optional dependencies: pip install quacc[all]
errors.golden_answer: Remove the system dependencies and version pinning, use: pip install quacc
